misc: Has been working on his mental game a lot
biography: Eero, the pride of Vuosaari Golf Helsinki, is set to make his eighth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. As the younger brother of the esteemed Pasi, Eero has carved out his own distinguished path in the world of golf.

Known for his sharp wit and calculated approach to the game, Eero is a formidable competitor. While the coveted Hector Trophée has eluded him thus far, Eero's skill has been rewarded with one Victor Trophy, marking him as one of the most talented individual players to grace the tournament.

In preparation for the upcoming Hector Trophée, Eero has been diligently honing his mental game, seeking to elevate his performance to new heights. With his unwavering determination and refined focus, Eero is poised to make a significant impact on the competition.
